name: Detarune Gamerune Frisk Battle (Demo)
description:
Sezuire Warning

Hi

This is a demo of my own Deltarune AU Gamerune. In this demo you 
must play a game with Gamerune Frisk. In the full version your choices will
affect the outcome of the battle, not just fighting or spare but very choice you make
will affect kris in some way.

Also please take note that I am still working on Delatrune Gaster and Fisk fight.

Thank you and please support me.
Follow me on Twitter: @FantasyRuinX
